nodes.text: The E-10R blaster rifle was a model of blaster rifle manufactured by BlasTech Industries used by range troopers of the Galactic Empire on Vandor.
Manufactured by BlasTech Industries, the rifle was a very robust variant of the E-10 blaster rifle.
Several Imperial range troopers were armed with BlasTech E-10R blaster rifles on Vandor during a heist on the conveyex by Tobias Beckett's gang.
